about_the_game:
Peasant Uprise is primarily a Role Playing Game that makes use of strategy and management mechanics. Unlike typical RPGs, in Peasant Uprise, the player can control a group of up to 30 unique characters at a time in a story where the focus lies on the peasants’ ability to cope with adversity.

There is resource collection as well as facility building and even tool crafting. However, the focus is still on character progression, combat and the story. Most importantly, peasants are not your usual overpowered heroes and will depend on numbers and unusual tactics to overcome properly trained and equipped soldiers.

Manage Your Rebellion


Peasant Uprise is a harsh game that showcases the realities of a medieval uprise. The player will need to provide food and some commodities to keep the rebellion alive and will have to manage each peasant's morale to keep them fighting for the cause.

Unique Characters


The aim is for each peasant to be unique, with a setup of needs, skills, and traits. Some even have special professions that will greatly help your cause! How you choose to develop your peasants is up to you, but keep in mind that some peasants WILL fall in battle against trained and equipped soldiers, that's the cruel reality of a peasant uprise.

Non-linear Map


Travel through the Province of Swayne in any way you want. You can choose the shortest road to Swayne but your rebellion may be ill prepared once the destination is reached. Longer routes are also available which may yield more peasants and resources. However, time is a very important factor in Peasant Uprise as with the passing of time, enemy forces will receive reinforcements and further training that will increase their level and skills, in such a way that lingering for too long will present a bigger challenge to face.

Features


  • Up to 30 unique characters
    • 30 levels of progression
    • 4 personal attributes
    • 7 skills to choose from
    • 6 traits that further define your character
    • 11 distinct professions
  • 20 non-linear levels
  • Story & Questing
  • Resource gathering
  • Build facilities
  • Craft tools, potions and advanced resources
  • Marketplaces to trade your goods
  • Distinct enemies that evolve through time

short_description: Peasant Uprise sets a group of peasants on a deadly quest against the new lord that has taken over their province. Unskilled in the arts of war, they will use their only known skills and tools to regain control of the Province of Swayne.
